name: respectably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a respectable way: The two men were middle-aged and respectably dressed.
in a way that achieves a reasonable result: He performed respectably in the Olympics, although he won no medals. It is a small-budget film, but it has done respectably at the box office.
